reviewText:
In the first episode we meet a seeker of the Grail, a man who believes to be cursed and a creature that hides in a Vorlon suit. The attempt to introduce the Grail lore to the series is not a successful one, but the episode has a few good moments, most of them around a hideous mind absorbing creature.
"Eyes" was a complete disappointment. Sinclair is facing court martial, but the plot is much too thin.
A little odd, but fairly good. This is tape 1.9 (Grail, Eyes)
